alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:56PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pitkin and northwestern Gunnison Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 456 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marble, or 31 miles south of Glenwood Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marble and Redstone. This includes Colorado 133 between mile markers 42 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
